about_the_game:
As an investigator of the Disaster Investigation Department, you are dispatched to Black Mist Island, the epicenter of all disasters, to uncover the truth behind the apocalypse. Here, tens of thousands of monsters are created and sent to the world. You must find a way to eliminate them, stop the disaster from worsening, and investigate its truth. Although the final truth may be unexpected, as the strongest warrior, you must first eliminate the monsters.

You have access to a variety of weapons, each with its own unique skills. Additionally, you can deploy various defense buildings and summon soldiers as powerful as you to help eliminate the monsters. The game features various harsh weather conditions to immerse you in the sense of post-apocalyptic survival, and the satisfying combat mechanics hope to captivate you.

-Continuous upgrading provides different passive attributes for you to choose from to strengthen yourself.
-Choose your favorite weapon to create a unique enhancement path.
-Different regions feature powerful bosses.
-Continuously search for resources to actively upgrade.
-Zombies and mutants will continuously charge at you from different directions, so don't get surrounded by them, or you won't be able to escape.

short_description: Disaster Plan Z is a hardcore single-player shooting survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Players need to utilize various weapons along with their unique skills, construct different buildings, and continuously upgrade to resist the invasion of countless zombies and mutant creatures.
